QuestData.Title: Sang'thraze the Deflector
QuestData.Description: The blood speaks. I can feel its flow through the sand...drenched in death, a desert of suffering...$B$B<Mazoga's eyes roll back in his head.>$B$BThere! The blood flows to the south, in a valley of bones. Zakkaru! Zakkaru, spawn of Makkari, the dark one who demands sacrifice... his father forced from Zul'Farrak, his ascension interrupted... he will taste blood once more...$B$B<Mazora reels.>$B$BGo, $c. Zakkaru has Sang'thraze. Ya not be wanting him to keep it, trust me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Zakkaru and collect the Sealed Sang'Thraze.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did the spirits speak true, mon? You got it?
QuestData.RewardText: <Mazoga grins as he takes the sword from you in both hands.>$B$BDidn't like ya much, eh? More in this world craves blood than just trolls, mon.$B$BLet's find the other blade...
